author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/externals.c
(handle_externals_change): Check for cancellation in this long loop to
allow breaking the loop from cancel functions. This allows cancelation
for cancel functions that don't return SVN_ERR_CANCELLED and for
cancellations that are wrapped by the update handling.

author: fitzner
msg: ETCH-157 compiler: add @Signal annotation support
The @Signal method annotation causes a new Signal to be
created and added to the service. Two methods (subscribe and unsubscribe)
are generated and added to the signal. The subscription methods are
two-way so that they could be overriden and throw an exception if
the subscription fails for any reason.
Patch from Aleksandar Kanchev <kanchev@itestra.com>

author: alexdma
msg: STANBOL-285:
- Centralized registry population methods in RegistryManager
- Added exception and event model for loading registry resources (TODO actual loading not re-implemented yet, still using old RegistryLoader)
- ONManagerImpl now takes a RegistryManager as a constructor argument. This is probably temporary and might be removed once the old RegistryLoader is decommissioned.
- Adapted other Stanbol unit tests to invoke updated ONManager constructor

author: fitzner
msg: ETCH-157 binding-c: add udp single session transport
Add UDP support to the C binding (single session only).
URL parameter UdpConnection.singleSession is ignored.
To support broadcasts (Linux) a patched version of APR
(test with version 1.4.2) is needed. The patch has been
submitted, but is currently not integrated.
See https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=46389
Patch from Armin Mueller <mueller@itestra.com>

author: rickhall
